about_the_game:
One day, the kingdom wakes up to a morning in which all inner chambers' gates are locked and their keys vanish. The kingdom chooses the Lancelot to find all keys and unlock all locked gates. As the Lancelot, use the crates and solve the puzzles for unlocking all the gates.

-- FEATURES --
- Play through 8 unique stages.
- Physics based puzzles.
- Challenging collectables to collect.

-- KEY BINDINGS --

E - Interact
R - Restart Scene
A-D / Left Arrow Key-Right Arrow Key - Movement
Space - Jump
Ctrl - Grab
ESC - Pause

-- FEATURES --

name: Crate Knight Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740, Radeon 530 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Solve the puzzles by using the environment interactions as Lancelot in this puzzle platformer game. If you find more keys, you will be able to get closer to the more difficult puzzles
